short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Add-on creates extra keyboard shortcuts to various websites for easier use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Add-on adds extra keyboard shortcuts to a number of different websites. The main purpose for this Add-on is to help people who have trouble moving the mouse cursor to the correct place.
